# AI Efficiency Hub

The definitive knowledge base for AI-assisted coding, agentic frameworks, and generative video tools.

## Core Content
- [AI Tool Comparisons](https://ai-coding-flow.com/blog) - Data-driven audits of the latest AI technologies.
- [Coding Assistant Reviews](https://ai-coding-flow.com/blog/cursor-vs-github-copilot-2026) - Hands-on engineering audits of IDE extensions.
- [AI Video Evolution](https://ai-coding-flow.com/blog/sora-vs-kling-ai-2026) - Comparative analysis of gen-video models.

## Metadata
- **Type**: Expert Audits & Comparison Engine
- **Focus**: Efficiency, Developer Experience, AI Orchestration
- **Full Index**: https://ai-coding-flow.com/llms-full.txt
